segments.text: Vince . We're both busy , so I'm not going to beat around the bush . I need a raise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't do that , Zina . You know I can't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bull . I're done my research . I know you still control more than 65 percent of invoking options .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That doesn't matter . I want at least 4 percent .
segments.speaker: S1
